summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Twenty Dollars ($20.00) from the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the third annual premium on a re-delivery bond furnished by the Mayor in the suit of People's Pharmacy, a corporation, vs. C. L. Beckingham, et al., Cause No. 115533, of the files of the Superior Court of King County, Washington, and directing the City Comptroller to issue a warrant therefor.
